system.description:
An amulet that prevents disembodied spirits from entering and possessing the wearerâ€™s body.

  • Magic jar: The magic-user spell @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.mSgmimBzP2XdC30B]{magic jar} cannot affect the wearer.

  • Ghostly possession: The possession attack of @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.monsters.Actor.mJzI6EZT0xTNc8OW]{ghosts} is ineffective against the wearer.
